name: vLance
description:
With the increase in demand for the reliable, skillful and reasonable-priced outsourcing, vLance helps individual clients/businesses to find, hire and work with the expert local freelancers/providers.

It is the first online freelance staffing platform in Vietnam and Indochina. It starts with Vietnamese local language (the dual Eng/Viet language version is coming later) to help clients and freelancers easily connect to each other in 4 steps.
On another hand, vLance is also created for the talented local freelancers to be found and challenged via different levels.
